somnambulantmod: RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn TOUCH

somnambulantmod: DarkeningMindPower.NAME: Darkening Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Nightmare, gain #b

somnambulantmod: HushPower.NAME: Hush
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, shuffle #b

somnambulantmod: ImpenetrableMindPower.NAME: Impenetrable Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, gain #b

somnambulantmod: MentalBarrierPower.NAME: Mental Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
block, then reduce #yMental #yBarrier by #b1. Whenever you take attack damage, lower your Mental Barrier by that amount.

somnambulantmod: InLimboPower.NAME: In Limbo
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play your #b4th card in a turn, add your discard pile to the top of your draw pile in random order

somnambulantmod: LoseFormPower.NAME: Lose Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play a card from your discard pile and exhaust it.

somnambulantmod: LoseFormRandomPower.NAME: Lose Form (random)
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play a random card from your discard pile and exhaust it.

somnambulantmod: DeeperSleepPower.NAME: Deeper Sleep
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Dream, gain #b

somnambulantmod: LucidityPower.NAME: Lucidity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, add #b
Dream(s) to your discard pile. All cards exhaust when played.

somnambulantmod: SleepingBodyPower.NAME: Sleeping Body
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Dream or Nightmare, gain #b

somnambulantmod: RelivePower.NAME: Relive
DESCRIPTIONS: copies of the next card you play this turn into your draw pile.

somnambulantmod: RefracturePower.NAME: Refracture
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card, deal #b

somnambulantmod: IgnorancePower.NAME: Ignorance
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card this turn, gain #b

somnambulantmod: RuthlessStudyPower.NAME: Ruthless Study
DESCRIPTIONS: Until end of turn, whenever you draw a card, gain #b

somnambulantmod: LostMindPower.NAME: Lost Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b

somnambulantmod: GalaxyBrainPower.NAME: Galaxy Brain
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Dream, exhaust all cards in your hand.

somnambulantmod: MindlessnessPower.NAME: Mindlessness
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card, add #b

somnambulantmod: NightHauntsPower.NAME: Haunted
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card this turn, apply #b
